thread.section_title: Liftopia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Liftopia | liftopia.com
thread.title: Sean

author: Sean
title: Sean
text: When I bought my tickets over a month ago, I read about how they offer a significant discounted rate when purchased in advance. They make it clear there are no cancellations, and for that reason they can offer a discount. I took a gamble and went with it. I knew what I was getting into. Today I checked into mammoth mountain ca with a 2 day pass for 127.00. The daily lift ticket just for today was 145.00. I got two lift tickets for less than the price of one. Checking in and picking up my pass took less than a minute.
